Package org.cyclops.cyclopscore.inventory

Interface IValueNotifiable

All Known Implementing Classes:
ContainerExtended, ContainerInfoBookTest, ContainerScreenExtended, ContainerScreenScrolling, InventoryContainer, ItemInventoryContainer, ScrollingInventoryContainer
public interface IValueNotifiable
Used for receiving values from servers to clients in guis.
